pages.text: Certain bees have very negative effects on anything nearby - a specially-made set of armor can help deal with that. Anyone wearing a full set of apiarist armor is largely immune to any bee effects in the vicinity.

pages.title: Silk Mesh
pages.text: You'll need a special base material - silk, obtained by centrifuging $(l:complicated_bees:other/propolis)propolis,$() should work perfect here.
